title: Implement AttachmentModal media rendering
description: Implement image and video rendering inside modal with proper sizing constraints. Add loading state with spinner for large media files. Implement progressive image loading with blur placeholder.
dod: Image rendering: img element with max-width: 90vw, max-height: 90vh
Video rendering: video element with native controls, same max dimensions
Object-fit: contain to preserve aspect ratio
Loading state: Loader2 icon with spin animation from lucide-react
Loading state shown while media loading (useState for isLoading)
onLoad handler sets isLoading to false
Progressive loading: blur placeholder or skeleton while loading
Media centered in modal (flex items-center justify-center)
Handle attachment type check (image vs video) properly
